Name: unique_story_assignment
Description: Each user story is assigned to at most one sprint

Name: sprint_capacity_story_points
Description: Story points in a sprint do not exceed velocity capacity

Name: worker_capacity_effort
Description: Effort assigned to a worker does not exceed availability

Name: project_budget_cap
Description: Allocated feature budgets do not exceed project budget

Name: goal_activation_consistency
Description: Sprint goal variable cannot exceed achievement status

Name: feature_must_be_in_backlog
Description: Only features present in the Product Backlog can be released

Name: minimum_review_attendance
Description: At least one stakeholder participates in Sprint Review

Name: tasks_within_sprint_backlog
Description: Number of scheduled tasks does not exceed Sprint Backlog capacity

Name: blocked_task_requires_resolution
Description: Blocked tasks cannot be scheduled unless their blocker is resolved

Name: scrumboard_matches_scheduled_tasks
Description: Scrum Board cards equal number of scheduled tasks

Name: epic_included_if_story_planned
Description: If a story is planned its Epic must be included/active

Name: velocity_lower_bound
Description: Selected team capacity per sprint is at least the minimum velocity
